1. City Council

City Council

The Portland City Council has seven members - a Mayor and six Council Members.

Mayor Cathy Skurow (Term expires 2026) Four as Mayor Eight as a Council Member (Three of those as Mayor Pro Tem) Email : Cathy.Skurow@PortlandTX.gov

Mayor Pro Tem John Green
Elected: 2025 (Term expires 2027)
Previous Terms:
Ten as a Council Member
(Seven as Mayor Pro Tem)
Email : John.Green@PortlandTX.gov

Elected: 2025 (Term expires 2027)
Previous Terms:
Six as a Council Member
(One as Mayor Pro Tem)

Elected: 2025 (Term expires 2027)
Previous Terms:
Five as a City Council Member
Email : John.Sutton@PortlandTX.gov
Gary W. Moore Jr.
Elected: 2024 (Term expires 2026)
Previous Terms:
Three as a City Council Member

Appointed: 2021 (Term expired 2022)
Elected: 2024 (Term expires 2026)
Previous Terms:

Email : Zach.Albrecht@PortlandTX.gov
Martha Ruiz
Elected: 2025 (Term expires 2027)

N/A
Email: Martha.Ruiz@PortlandTX.gov

Portland operates under the council / manager form of municipal government. With this structure, the City Council and Mayor are elected by the citizens, and the City Council and Mayor hire a professional administrator, known as the city manager (link), to execute council policy and manage the day-to-day operations of the city.
